rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, search your library for up to five instant and/or sorcery cards with different names, exile them, then shuffle.
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card exiled with this enchantment at random. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of cards exiled with this enchantment. If you don’t, you may cast that card.
